short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will replace the word Trump with any other word the user chooses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the word Trump with any word you choose. Just enter it into the form and submit. If you would like to update the replacement word, just click on the extension and enter a new one.
